structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.catch_line: Payment of compensation to property valuation administrator.

text.section: The property valuation administrator of each county shall be paid from the State Treasury each month as provided in KRS 132.590.

Deputies, other authorized personnel, and other authorized expenditures of the property valuation administrator's office shall be paid from the State Treasury monthly as approved by the Department of Revenue as provided in KRS 132.590(2).

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, secs. 214 and 215, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 245, sec. 3. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 186, Art. I, sec. 37, effective July 2, 1960. -- Amended 1949 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 12. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 39, sec. 1.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/20/2005). This section was amended by 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85. secs. 214 and 215, which are identical and have been codified together.
